import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../JS/Header'; import Footer from '../JS/Footer'; import '../CSS/Footer.css'; import '../CSS/Header.css'; import '../CSS/ArticlesPage.css'; // Create this CSS file import '../CSS/HomePage.css'; // Reuse HomePage styles const ArticlesPage = () => { const isAuthenticated = localStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated'); const articles = [ { id: 1, title: "Recognizing Different Forms of Harassment", summary: "Learn to identify verbal, physical, and digital harassment in workplace and public settings.", content: "Harassment can take many forms... [detailed content]", category: "awareness" }, { id: 2, title: "Legal Rights and Reporting Procedures in Jordan", summary: "Understand your legal protections and how to formally report incidents.", content: "Jordanian law provides specific protections... [detailed content]", category: "legal" } ]; return (

Self-Protection Resource Center

Empowering knowledge to recognize, prevent, and respond to harassment

{articles.map(article => (
{article.category.toUpperCase()}

{article.title}

{article.summary}

))}

  • Jordanian Women's Union
); }; export default ArticlesPage;
